title: Security and Compliance Center docs
introduction: With IBM Cloud Security and Compliance Center, you can embed security checks into your every day workflows to help monitor for security and compliance.

section_recommended.title: What is a collector?
section_recommended.description: To start monitoring your compliance posture, you must first create a collector.

section_recommended.title: What is a rule?
section_recommended.description: A rule is used to define the guardrails for how resources can be configured in your account.

section_recommended.title: Viewing your current posture
section_recommended.description: Learn more about your compliance score and how it is calculated.

tiles.title: Now available: Event Notifications integration
tiles.description: You can now integrate Security and Compliance Center to the Event Notifications service.

tiles.title: Now available: Customer-managed collectors on clusters
tiles.description: You can now install a customer-managed collector onto an IBM Cloud Kubernetes Service or OpenShift.

tiles.title: Now available: New goals
tiles.description: New goals are now available in the IBM Cloud Best Practices profile.
